versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Schedules tasks into time blocks

schema.prompt:
Create an optimized time-blocked schedule for the following tasks:

Prioritized Tasks: {{input.prioritizedTasks}}
Available Time Windows: {{input.timeWindows}}
Existing Commitments: {{input.existingCommitments}}
Energy Patterns: {{input.energyPatterns}}
Preferences: {{input.preferences}}

Generate a time-blocked schedule that:
1. Assigns specific time blocks to each task
2. Respects existing commitments and meetings
3. Matches high-focus tasks to peak energy times
4. Includes buffer time between blocks (15-30 min)
5. Schedules breaks using Pomodoro or Ultradian rhythms
6. Groups similar tasks for efficiency
7. Protects deep work blocks from interruptions
8. Includes time for email/admin tasks
9. Builds in flexibility for unexpected items
10. Ends with a brief review/planning block

Consider:
- Cognitive load and task switching costs
- Natural energy rhythms throughout the day
- Realistic time estimates with padding

Return as structured JSON with keys: timeBlocks (array with start/end times and tasks), breakSchedule (array), deepWorkBlocks (array), adminBlocks (array), bufferTime (total minutes), reviewBlock (object).

props.placeholder: Tasks in priority order with time estimates...
When do you have high/low energy? (e.g., high energy mornings)
Any preferences? (e.g., no meetings before 10am, lunch at 12:30)

translations.description: Creates optimized time-blocked schedules matching tasks to energy levels
translations.instructions: Enter your prioritized tasks and available time. The system will create an optimized schedule with time blocks, breaks, and buffer time.
translations.name: Time Block Scheduler
